result.name: health-safety-and-environment-records
result.notes: Procedures, records, assessments, reports etc. related to the health and safety of staff and equipment related to the UK fusion programme.

organization.name: united-kingdom-atomic-energy-authority
organization.title: United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority
organization.description: The UK Atomic Energy Authority carries out fusion research in the UK on behalf of the government and manages the JET fusion project on behalf of the EU at the Culham Centre for Fusion Energy (CCFE).

result.title: Health, Safety and Environment Records

extras.value: N/A Internal Use Only.  There is no plan to release this information. Some is personal, some is owned by the EU (related to the operation of JET), some commercially sensitive and the remainder is of a transient nature. A summary of HSE and Sustainability is provided in the Authority Annual Report and Accounts.
